1.title: Inspirational Homepage
1.description: An application that interacts with OpenWeather, Unsplash, and Quotes APIs to display the current weather, a background image, and an inspirational quote.

2.title: ICS414 Event Planner
2.description: A simple, fast, lightweight event planner that has adherence with RFC 5545 and features that were specified in the project requirements.

3.title: ICS314 clUHbs
3.description: An application that provides a centralized directory for UH Manoa student clubs with brief descriptions, meeting times and locations, URLs to websites (if any), contact information for officers, and a few select photos.

4.title: ICS212 Bank Record Database
4.description: A bank record database using command-line interface to practice program structure. The user is able to add, delete, print individual and print all records.
